function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertain effectiveness of social distancing for certain modes of disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and spread in scenarios where social distancing is not effective","Mitigation":"Expand research on the effectiveness of social distancing for various modes of disease transmission","Technologies":"Data analytics for tracking and analyzing disease transmission modes","People":"General population, public health authorities, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inconsistent terminology (social distancing vs. physical distancing)","Impact":"Confusion and misunderstanding of appropriate measures for disease control","Mitigation":"Align terminology and provide clear communication on the intended measures","Technologies":"Communication technology for widespread dissemination of information","People":"General population, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Acceptability of social distancing as a temporary measure","Impact":"Resistance to adhering to social distancing guidelines in the long term","Mitigation":"Promote understanding of the temporary nature of social distancing and provide support for mental health and well-being during implementation","Technologies":"Telehealth and digital mental health support platforms","People":"General population, mental health professionals, policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies, mental health organizations"}]}
